TOTAL FILES CREATED: 13

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

KEY COMPONENTS SUMMARY:

1. MASTER SETUP GUIDE (GITHUB_SETUP_GUIDE.md)
   â”œâ”€â”€ GitHub Projects Board Setup
   â”œâ”€â”€ 47-Label System (organized by category)
   â”œâ”€â”€ 9 Milestones Structure
   â”œâ”€â”€ Branch Protection Rules (main + develop)
   â”œâ”€â”€ CI/CD Workflow Recommendations (10 workflows)
   â”œâ”€â”€ GitHub Discussions Setup (9 categories)
   â”œâ”€â”€ Wiki Structure (10+ pages)
   â”œâ”€â”€ Status Badges Configuration
   â””â”€â”€ Automation Workflows

2. LABEL SYSTEM (47 labels in 7 categories)
   â”œâ”€â”€ Type (7): feature, enhancement, bug, hotfix, docs, refactor, tech-debt
   â”œâ”€â”€ Component (8): seller-site, buyer-storefront, admin-console, pricing-engine, api, database, integrations, infrastructure
   â”œâ”€â”€ Domain (8): pricing, inventory, submissions, catalog, checkout, shipping, notifications, auth
   â”œâ”€â”€ Priority (4): critical, high, medium, low
   â”œâ”€â”€ Status (7): blocked, needs-info, ready, needs-testing, needs-review, wontfix, duplicate
   â”œâ”€â”€ Effort (5): xs, s, m, l, xl
   â””â”€â”€ Special (7): good-first-issue, help-wanted, breaking-change, security, performance, accessibility, epic

3. MILESTONES (9 phases, 16 weeks)
   â”œâ”€â”€ Foundation (v0.1) - Weeks 1-2
   â”œâ”€â”€ Catalog & Pricing Engine (v0.2) - Weeks 3-4
   â”œâ”€â”€ Seller Site (v0.3) - Weeks 5-6
   â”œâ”€â”€ Admin Console - Submissions (v0.4) - Weeks 7-8
   â”œâ”€â”€ Inventory Management (v0.5) - Weeks 9-10
   â”œâ”€â”€ Buyer Storefront (v0.6) - Weeks 11-12
   â”œâ”€â”€ Checkout & Fulfillment (v0.7) - Weeks 13-14
   â”œâ”€â”€ Polish & Launch Prep (v1.0) - Weeks 15-16
   â””â”€â”€ Post-Launch Enhancements (v1.1+) - Ongoing

4. PROJECT BOARD STRUCTURE
   â”œâ”€â”€ Columns: Backlog â†’ Ready â†’ In Progress â†’ Code Review â†’ Testing â†’ Done
   â”œâ”€â”€ Custom Fields: Priority, Effort, Component, Sprint, Target Date
   â””â”€â”€ Automation: Auto-move based on status changes

5. AUTOMATION & CI/CD
   â”œâ”€â”€ Auto-label PRs by file paths
   â”œâ”€â”€ Auto-assign reviewers by code ownership
   â”œâ”€â”€ Stale issue management
   â”œâ”€â”€ New contributor welcome
   â”œâ”€â”€ Dependabot updates
   â”œâ”€â”€ Milestone progress tracking
   â””â”€â”€ 10 recommended GitHub Actions workflows

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

QUICK START:

1. Run label setup:
   $ cd .github/workflows
   $ ./label-setup.sh

2. Follow setup guide:
   $ open .github/GITHUB_SETUP_GUIDE.md

3. Read contributing guidelines:
   $ open .github/CONTRIBUTING.md

4. Start contributing:
   $ gh issue list --label "good-first-issue"

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

DOCUMENTATION PATHS:

Main Guides:
  .github/GITHUB_SETUP_GUIDE.md      Complete setup instructions
  .github/CONTRIBUTING.md            How to contribute
  .github/QUICK_REFERENCE.md         Command reference
  .github/SETUP_README.md            Setup overview
  .github/IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md  What was created

Issue Templates:
  .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.yml
  .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.yml
  .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/epic.yml

Configuration:
  .github/CODEOWNERS                 Code ownership
  .github/dependabot.yml             Dependency updates
  .github/labeler.yml                Auto-labeling rules
  .github/auto-assign.yml            Auto-reviewer assignment

Automation:
  .github/workflows/label-setup.sh   Create all labels
